title: Groups not listing in Save Modal in Voice APIs
body:
1, groups not listing in dropdown
2. on saving without group 500 Internal Server Error
3. Error not handled in client side
author: NehaMadnani

comments.body:
1. Groups do not show up on the fly right now, if you reload the page - it shows
2. Test are being saved, both individually and in group. Issue was with account - has been fixed
3 - will create seperate ticket for error handling on client side overall
